column4: hallo ubuntu users, im a what i think you would refere to as a newbie, i want to use ubuntu as a normal desktop os like windows, but i want a LAMP configuration and i would like all installation and running linux to be GUI. what shall i use
yes but i want install and the system to be gui, ofcourse there is command-line underneath
I use the GUI more often than not, but I am still required to use the command line in certain situations
